name: GreenTeam
description:
A team of vegetables and a fruit with different strengths and weaknesses Fight to protect their forest against the evil Count Herbicide and his friend Chef Mockingbird

Controls [keyboard]-

G  + Arrows/Scrollweel to Change Character

P to pause

Press A to Ground Pound as squash

Controls [keyboard]-

A/B to jump

RB + Dpad/RS to Change Character

+ to pause

Press A/B to Ground Pound as squash
